name: brecht/laravel-queue-interop
description: Laravel queue interop context manager, fake and facade

suggest.enqueue/amqp-ext: Required to use the AMQP Ext transport.
suggest.enqueue/amqp-bunny: Required to use the AMQP Bunny transport.
suggest.enqueue/amqp-lib: Required to use the AMQP Lib transport.
suggest.enqueue/snsqs: Required to use the Amazon SNS-SQS transport.
suggest.enqueue/sqs: Required to use the Amazon SQS transport.
suggest.enqueue/gps: Required to use the Google Pub Sub transport.
suggest.enqueue/pheanstalk: Required to use the Beanstalk (Pheanstalk) transport.
suggest.enqueue/gearman: Required to use the Gearman transport.
suggest.enqueue/rdkafka: Required to use the Kafka transport.
suggest.enqueue/stomp: Required to use the Stomp transport.
suggest.enqueue/redis: Required to use the Redis transport.
suggest.enqueue/wamp: Required to use the Web Application Messaging Protocol (WAMP) transport.
suggest.enqueue/dbal: Required to use the Doctrine DBAL transport.
suggest.enqueue/fs: Required to use the Filesystem transport.
suggest.enqueue/null: Required to use the NULL transport.
